title: PODCAST | THE INTERVIEW: Interviewing Hollywood star David Moscow on a boat in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean for his new TV show 'From Scratch'
text:
PODCAST | THE INTERVIEW: Interviewing Hollywood star David Moscow on a boat in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean for his new TV show 'From Scratch'

Cape Town – For this, the very first podcast episode of The Interview, I climbed into the tiniest of boats with a fisherman, a whole camera crew, and a Hollywood star. David Moscow.

You might know David for his work in films like Big (alongside Tom Hanks), Newsies, and Honey.

We caught up with him and his team as they arrived in SA from the Philippines filming his new docu-series titled From Scratch which he created with his wife Karen.

From Scratch uncovers the realities of food production today, the history of our food and the science behind it and is co-produced by NV Studios and UnLtd Productions.

A South African release date is yet to be confirmed.
